Salary: $90-110k+

Location: Onsite in Alabama

Job Description:
– An exciting opportunity for an HIM Supervisor/Manager/Assistant Director/Director to work in an important HIM Operations/Privacy Director role directly for a 300+ bed acute care hospital leading a team of about 15 FTE’s
– Hands-on coding knowledge isn’t required in this position as coding reports to Finance however previous experience working with coding department leadership, coding teams and general coding knowledge is desired
– The current HIM Director is retiring but will be staying onboard to ensure a smooth transition

Requirements:
– RHIA Credential (It’s possible an RHIT Credential with exceptional experience would be considered)
– At least 3 years of previous HIM Supervisory/Management/Director experience in a similarly sized acute care facility
– Prior experience going through JCAHO reviews is very important as this facility is scheduled for a Joint Commission review in early 2025
– Must be willing to work onsite at the facility

Benefits:
– This is a unique HIM Operations/Privacy Director position that doesn’t require coding oversight which isn’t something I see often
– It’s a full-time, full-benefit (which are excellent), stable, long-term opportunity working directly for a facility
– $90-110k+
– Relocation assistance potentially available for ideal candidate
